argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | adddirp1d.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | adddirp1d.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( ph -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_adddird | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + 1 ) x. B ) = ( ( A x. B ) + ( 1 x. B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_mulid2d | |- ( ph -> ( 1 x. B ) = B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) + ( 1 x. B ) ) = ( ( A x. B ) + B ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + 1 ) x. B ) = ( ( A x. B ) + B ) ) |
